mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TC (B, AAS, BBS, CCS, AAA, BBA, CCA, AASS, AAC, DDS) SELECT TA_SUM.B, C_AA_SUM/AA_SUM, C_BB_SUM/BB_SUM, C_CC_SUM/CC_SUM, C_AA_SUM/TB_AA_SUM, C_BB_SUM/TB_BB_SUM, C_CC_SUM/TB_CC_SUM, C_EE_SUM/EE_SUM, (C_AA_SUM+C_EE_SUM)/(AA_SUM+EE_SUM), C_DD_SUM/DD_SUM FROM (SELECT TA.B, SUM(AA) AA_SUM, SUM(BB) BB_SUM, SUM(CC) CC_SUM, SUM(DD) DD_SUM, SUM(EE) EE_SUM FROM TA GROUP BY TA.B) AS TA_SUM LEFT JOIN (SELECT TB.B, SUM(C_AA) C_AA_SUM, SUM(C_BB) C_BB_SUM, SUM(C_CC) C_CC_SUM, SUM(C_DD) C_DD_SUM, SUM(C_EE) C_EE_SUM, SUM(AA) TB_AA_SUM, SUM(BB) TB_BB_SUM, SUM(CC) TB_CC_SUM FROM TB GROUP BY TB.B) AS TB_SUM ON TA_SUM.B = TB_SUM.B WHERE TA_SUM.B IS NOT NULL;
mapper.select: select * from tc where b like concat('%',#{b},'%');
